item.title: Access Control Tool for Adobe Experience Manager by Netcentric
item.description: I would like to share an awesome blog post about Access Control Tool for AEM/CQ with you. The Tool was developed by Netcentric and open sourced to help other AEM developers. Blog post –> AEM: AC Tool or How To Manage Groups & Users Quite a comprehensive guide which covers the following topics: * What is it and why do you need this tool * Setup * Migration * Best practices how to organize project structure to most of the AC tool * Configuration basics
